DoomStack.statusDescription: Too many stacks will result in Doom.

NearTether.statusDescription: Green tether will pop if too close to partner.

FarTether.statusDescription: Blue tether will pop if too far from partner.

LatentDna.statusDescription: Sentenced to get hit by a mechanic.

Defamation.statusDescription: Exploding in a large radius at the end of this effect.

Stack.statusDescription: Exploding with shared damage at the end of this effect.

BlueRot.statusDescription: Affected by a performance bug and spreading it to touched allies.

DefamationDebugger.statusDescription: Immune to the next overflow bug.

StackDebugger.statusDescription: Immune to the next synchronization bug.

PinkDna.statusDescription: Performing a massive explosion upon effect expiry. Effect can be cleansed via a certain action.

BlueRavioli.statusDescription: Performing a massive explosion upon effect expiry. Effect can be cleansed via a certain action.
